P0300.title: Random/Multiple Cylinder Misfire Detected
P0300.description: Random/Multiple Cylinder Misfire Detected. The PCM has detected that multiple cylinders are misfiring or that the misfire is not isolated to a single cylinder.

P0420.title: Catalyst System Efficiency Below Threshold (Bank 1)
P0420.description: Catalyst System Efficiency Below Threshold (Bank 1). The oxygen storage capacity of the catalytic converter has fallen below the acceptable threshold for Bank 1.

P0171.title: System Too Lean (Bank 1)
P0171.description: System Too Lean (Bank 1). The fuel trim system has reached its limit trying to add fuel; the air-fuel mixture is too lean on Bank 1.

P0455.title: Evaporative Emission System Leak Detected (Gross Leak)
P0455.description: Evaporative Emission System Leak Detected (Gross Leak). A large leak has been detected in the evaporative emission control system (e.g. loose or missing gas cap, disconnected hose).
